code: public class Main { public static int fib(int n){ int a=0,b=1; for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ int t=a; a=b; b=t+b; } return a; } public static void testFib(){ if(fib(10)!=55) throw new RuntimeException("Test failed!"); System.out.println("Test passed!"); } public static void main(String[] args){ testFib(); } }
